message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $12,000.  I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your offer, the product's value to you is substantial. I'm willing to come down to $11,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider that?
